content: I'm a final-year undergraduate student majoring in Polymer Science and Engineeing from the Indian Institute of Technology Roorkee. I'm a Machine Learning enthusiast with a demonstrated history of working with several IT industries including tech giants like IBM. Skilled in various Machine Learning frameworks and python development along with good management and team work skills.
